FormData();formData.append('title',title);formData.append('description',description);formData.append('categories',JSON.stringify(Object.keys(categories).filter(key=>categories[key])));if(imageFile){formData.append('image',imageFile);}axiosInstance.put(`/updatePost/${postId}`,formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}}).then(response=>{Swal.fire({title:'Tu
